page.title: 03CLUBS IN CANFORD MAGNA
page.content: {THE BROADSTONE CRICKET CLUB}celebrates its centenary in l985.Its grounds are in Delph Woods.It has 80 members,& fields 3 sides at weekends.It has a 1st,2nd & 3rd eleven,& Colts.There is a clubhouse.Membership fee Â£12 adults. {BROADSTONE CRICKET CLUB}dates from1898 it covers 250acres,bounded by Merley Farm & the disused railway line,down to the Fairview Estate.There are 800 members whose fees vary,an average is Â£150.The new clubhouse was opened in l985.There are about 20 employees, including a golf professional, secret- ary & catering staff.{BROADSTONE SCOUT {GROUP}is the second oldest in the country,being formed only 5 months after Baden-Powells book"Scouting for Boys"was published in Jan.l908.There are usually about l00 scouts & 80-100 cubs in the group.
